content.p: The School of Geography attracts students from a range of countries, creating a thriving international research student community. A leading centre of postgraduate teaching and research, the School of Geography has internationally recognised strengths across the discipline. Individual postgraduate research projects may be based within one of our research themes or cross-over between research groups, and students may have supervisors drawn from more than one group. Our guide to applying Funding information Discover campus life with 360 degree images and videos on our virtual tour. Experience student life by exploring areas such as accommodation, student services, sport centres, libraries and the Researcher Academy. Visit our virtual tour Sir Clive Granger Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
